sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Xpdf package contains xpdf, pdftops, pdftotext, pdftoppm, pdffonts, pdfimages and pdfinfo.

sect3.title: xpdf
sect3.para: xpdf displays files in PDF format.

sect3.title: pdftops
sect3.para: pdftops converts PDF files to PS format.

sect3.title: pdftotext
sect3.para: pdftotext parses ASCII text from PDF files.

sect3.title: pdftoppm
sect3.para: pdftoppm converts PDF files to PBM, PGM, PPM formats.

sect3.title: pdffonts
sect3.para: pdffonts lists the fonts used in a PDF file along with various information for each font.

sect3.title: pdfimages
sect3.para: pdfimages saves images from a PDF file as PPM, PBM, or JPEG files.

sect3.title: pdfinfo
sect3.para: pdfinfo prints the contents of the 'Info' dictionary (plus some other useful information) from a PDF file.
